roles.char: Pitchman for Nestlé EverReady Cocoa - Dummy
Pitchman for Nestlé EverReady Cocoa - Ventriloquist
Pitchman for Nestlé EverReady Cocoa - Dummy

title: The Immigrants
description: Susannah and Nugey come across a family of stowaways hiding in a lifeboat.

title: The Witch Doctor
description: A phony witch doctor in Bali sells love charms to the crew and passengers of the Ocean Queen.

title: Wedding in Majorca
description: Susanna and Nugey try to sneak into a royal wedding.

title: The Phantom Valise
description: A mysterious valise, stuffed full with cash, keeps appearing and disappearing aboard the Ocean Queen.

title: The Case of the Chinese Puzzle
Susanna Takes a Husband
description: Susanna encounters the social-climbing mother of a former classmate at the Riviera. In an attempt to impress the smug Mrs. Gibney, Susanna claims she is married to the wealthy Charles Martingale, a passenger aboard the S.S. Ocean Queen. Her plan nearly backfires when Mrs. Gibney expresses a firm desire to meet Martindale. Gale Storm sings "Pennies From Heaven" in this episode.

title: Diamonds Are a Girl's Best Friend
The Case of the Music Box Thief
Robot from Inner Space
description: A robot causes havoc on the ship. I recall this show from my childhood. It features Robbie the Robot" from Forbidden planet.

title: The Million Dollar Mutt
description: Susanna and Nugey smuggle a sheep dog aboard the Ocean Queen. Unbeknownst to them, the dog is a missing movie star, Walt Disney's the Shaggy Dog.
